lead_paragraph: Shares of LM Ericsson plunged after the company forecast disappointing quarterly results and said it did not expect improvement any time soon.

headline.print_headline: Shares Inch Upward as Oil Prices Ebb
headline.main: Wall St. Closes Slightly Higher as Oil Prices Ebb

snippet: Shares of LM Ericsson plunged after the company forecast disappointing quarterly results and said it did not expect improvement any time soon....
abstract: Stocks rise slightly as oil prices fall.
